title: m4 still doesn't build with clang@4.0.0
body:
After #4883 was fixed, I tried `spack install m4%clang` again.  The build goes much further than before, but it still fails to build for me.  `spack-build.out` has the following error.  Have any of you seen this error? Does anyone have a work around for it?

```
Making all in src
make[2]: Entering directory `/tmp/kellyt/spack-stage/spack-stage-A9wI3C/m4-1.4.18/spack-build/src'
  CC       m4.o
  CC       debug.o
  CC       builtin.o
  CC       eval.o
  CC       format.o
  CC       freeze.o
  CC       input.o
  CC       macro.o
  CC       output.o
  CC       path.o
  CC       symtab.o
clang-4.0: warning: argument unused during compilation: '-rtlib=compiler-rt' [-Wunused-command-line-argument]
...
  CCLD     m4
/bin/ld: muloti4.c.o: access beyond end of merged section (410)
/bin/ld: muloti4.c.o: access beyond end of merged section (391)
/bin/ld: muloti4.c.o: access beyond end of merged section (370)
/bin/ld: muloti4.c.o: access beyond end of merged section (403)
/bin/ld: muloti4.c.o: access beyond end of merged section (379)
/bin/ld: muloti4.c.o: access beyond end of merged section (355)
/bin/ld: /scratch/kellyt/spack.20170801/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/llvm-4.0.0-mdwkdc7mbn4j7rd7vwpjqbcsnikjhvim/bin/../lib/clang/4.0.0/lib/linux/libclang_rt.builtins-x86_64.a(muloti4.c.o)(.debug_info+0xe1): reloc against `.debug_loc': error 2
/bin/ld: final link failed: Nonrepresentable section on output
clang-4.0: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
make[2]: *** [m4] Error 1
make[2]: Leaving directory `/tmp/kellyt/spack-stage/spack-stage-A9wI3C/m4-1.4.18/spack-build/src'
make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make[1]: Leaving directory `/tmp/kellyt/spack-stage/spack-stage-A9wI3C/m4-1.4.18/spack-build'
make: *** [all] Error 2

```
